name: UOAlpha
description:
Defend the Gem, collect Money, buy stronger weapons - 

Beware the Meadows boss on night 20.

Controls:

ESC : Open/Close Menu

WASD : Movement

 Space : Jump

Mouse Scroll : Adjust Camera Distance

Right Click : Toggle First-Person Perspective

12345 : Select/Toggle Unlocked Weapon

Left Click : Fire equipped Weapon/Navigate Menus
